mapper.insert: insert into place_info (place_id, formatted_phone_number, url, international_phone_number, formatted_address, name, photoreference, overview) values (#{place_id}, #{formatted_phone_number}, #{url}, #{international_phone_number}, #{formatted_address}, #{name}, #{photoreference}, #{overview});

insert into plan_plane (plan_id, departure, arrival, price, carrierCode, numberOfBookableSeats, numberOfStops, sequence) values(#{plan_id}, #{departure}, #{arrival}, #{price},#{carrierCode}, #{numberOfBookableSeats}, #{numberOfStops}, #{sequence})
insert into plan_route (plan_id, formatted_address, place_id, url, photo, sequence, idx) values(#{plan_id}, #{formatted_address}, #{place_id}, #{url},#{photo}, #{sequence}, #{idx})
mapper.update: update plan_plane set departure = #{departure}, arrival = #{arrival}, price = #{price}, carrierCode = #{carrierCode}, numberOfBookableSeats = #{numberOfBookableSeats}, numberOfStops = #{numberOfStops}, sequence = #{sequence} where plan_id = #{plan_id};
update plan_route set formatted_address = #{formatted_address}, place_id = #{place_id}, url = #{url}, photo = #{photo}, sequence = #{sequence}, idx = #{idx} where plan_id = #{plan_id};
